metadata.title: CVE-2019-9720 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer overflow in the subtitle decoder in Libav 12.3 allows attackers to corrupt the stack via a crafted video file in Matroska format, because srt_to_ass in libavcodec/srtdec.c misuses snprintf.

criterions.comment: gst-libav1.0 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
